MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW6 postcode areas of Eaton and Rushton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.35pm. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team are on site to investigate the network fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.16pm on 14th of Nov 2020.
